feed.title: Mike Hearn, who coined the term SPV is Satoshi

entry.title: Mike Hearn, who coined the term SPV is Satoshi
entry.summary: On October 9th, 2015, Boris Neklabaro shared a link on the Bitcoin-dev mailing list. The link led to a website that could only be accessed through Tor Browser, an encrypted and anonymous web browser. The purpose or content of the website is not specified in the context provided. However, the link was also provided without the requirement of using Tor Browser.
